verses.text: \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w however|strong="G1161"\w*, \w should|strong="G3588"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w such|strong="G1161"\w* subjects \w as|strong="G1161"\w* properly \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G1161"\w* \w place|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G2980"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3361"\w*, too, \w that|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w older|strong="G4247"\w* \w women|strong="G4247"\w* \w should|strong="G3361"\w* live \w reverent|strong="G2412"\w* lives, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w slanderers|strong="G1228"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w slaves|strong="G1402"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w excessive|strong="G4183"\w* \w drinking|strong="G3631"\w*.

\w In|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G5615"\w* \w way|strong="G5615"\w* \w with|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w younger|strong="G3501"\w* \w men|strong="G3501"\w* – \w encourage|strong="G3870"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3870"\w* \w be|strong="G3588"\w* self-controlled.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, set \w an|strong="G1722"\w* \w example|strong="G5179"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w doing|strong="G2041"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*. \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G3956"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*, \w show|strong="G3930"\w* integrity \w and|strong="G3956"\w* seriousness –

\w let|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w instruction|strong="G3056"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w give|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G2443"\w* \w sound|strong="G5199"\w* \w and|strong="G3056"\w* \w above|strong="G4012"\w* reproach, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* oppose \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G2443"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G1788"\w* \w when|strong="G2192"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* fail \w to|strong="G2443"\w* find \w anything|strong="G3367"\w* \w bad|strong="G5337"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*.

Teach \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* contradict \w or|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* pilfer, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w show|strong="G1731"\w* \w such|strong="G3588"\w* praiseworthy \w fidelity|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w everything|strong="G3956"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* recommend \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w* \w about|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w do|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* loving kindness \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* been revealed, \w bringing|strong="G4992"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*,

leading \w us|strong="G2249"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* renounce ungodliness \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worldly|strong="G2886"\w* \w desires|strong="G1939"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* self-controlled, \w upright|strong="G1346"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w godly|strong="G2153"\w* \w lives|strong="G2198"\w* \w here|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w present|strong="G3568"\w* age,

\w while|strong="G2532"\w* awaiting \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* – \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w appearing|strong="G2015"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G5228"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w on|strong="G5228"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w behalf|strong="G5228"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w deliver|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* wickedness, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w purify|strong="G2511"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* truly \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* eager \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*.
